title: The times, places, and persons of the holie Scripture. Otherwise entituled, The generall vievv of the Holy Scriptures
author: Hayne, Thomas, 1582-1645.
publisher: Printed by Thomas Purfoot, for Richard Ockould,
notes: Running title reads: The generall view of the holy Scriptures.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
